caption.title: Share of urban area affected (% of total number of grid cells) per world region and per LISA cluster.
caption.p: From the clusters, most recent urbanization, e.g. according to processes of polarization and (suburban/peri-urban) spread, is indicated by the HL and LL clusters, whose share is particularly high in the Global South, i.e., Africa, South America, and (South-East) Asia [ 14].
Click here for additional data file.
